para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:10px; margin-left:0px; line-height:2.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: (Y, X) returns the inverse tangent in radians of Y/X in the correct quadrant. The return value is in the range from -Pi to +Pi.
